resources.string: App lock support providing unlocking with pin or fingerprint. You should not use any 3rd party app lockers as they cause the app to malfunction.\n\nEnable: Settings > General > Pin Lock (Biometric).
Ability to customize theme colors like primary & accent that appears on toolbar, buttons, notification, etc. along with app launcher icon.\n\nEnable: Settings > Look & Feel.
Delete clips created after x days
Automatically delete clips which are created x days ago.\n\nEnable: Settings > General > Auto Delete clips.
This is an add-on extension that unlocks certain capabilities of the app which requires a small purchase to unlock.
